title: fps broken

replies.body: it fixed i found out my divers card was half installed last week

Hey MegaSpaceJX, 

If you're having FPS issues you should probably check out Riot's KB designated for that o.o Should fix your issue up: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting

If that doesn't work and you continue to have issues you should send in a ticket to Riot Support. 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
a few questions what graphic card do you have or does it have integrated graphics and what video settings are you running ?
it happens to old computers, you might have to downgrade back to windows 8, its a really long process. if your computer is newer then i have no clue.
my computer was brought as windows 10
